content: The Skanda of Feeling can be obtained by defeating Shigandang in Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform in Yellow Wind Ridge. This boss is located in the arena where you fought the Stone Vanguard, but you will need to activate it by interacting with the rock in the arena after collecting all 6 of the Buddha's Eyeballs throughout Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Feeling.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Feeling'.
The content is as follows:
The Skanda of Feeling can be obtained by defeating Shigandang in Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform in Yellow Wind Ridge. This boss is located in the arena where you fought the Stone Vanguard, but you will need to activate it by interacting with the rock in the arena after collecting all 6 of the Buddha's Eyeballs throughout Yellow Wind Ridge.
